title: Nice Studio in San Rafael
posting_body: McInnis Park Apartments in San Rafael, CA
Park Hill Apartments in San Rafael offers Studio apartments.
Our floor plans are designed with your comfort and enjoyment in mind.
Easy access to Shopping/Restaurants towards the northside of Lincoln Ave. and Highway 101.
Use the link below for more details:
This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 440 Sq.
- This is not your typical studio!
There are separate spaces within the unit so you can have guests over without them having to sit in your bedroom.
Enjoy a FULL kitchen with full sized appliances including a DISHWASHER!
- Along with your new apartment, you will receive a reserved parking spot and a BBQ area for you enjoy.
Weight Limit and No aggressive breeds
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033
